通常規矩係：如果題目多過一個日期，寫日期
例子：Cash book 要你入過去一個月既transactions，有比唔同日子，就寫翻日子；

如果題目所有野發生喺同一日，例如Partnership dissolution, Bank rec叫你Adjust cash book balance (所有adjustment都係月尾當日)，就只寫一次日期；marking唔出日期都試過好多次

必修有60/90都係mc，其餘20/30分先係非accounting既short question

Account 3-4底 但又同5差好遠 應該點算好

都係做多d financial accounting就做多d partnership/limited company，特別係financial statements格式，呢兩part睇落難，但係好多d題目好standardized，section C如果出就盡量揀題多statement既黎做，statement既好處係比較唔怕一子錯既情況發生，呢兩part應該執到好多分
除非aim星，Cost accounting唔洗操太多，熟左基本格式、formula同term就差唔多，通常係section a 1-2題，section b 1題，section A基本上冇咩難度，section B頭幾題分題盡量做，後面真係唔識就直接skip左佢啦，多d時間做其他題目拎分仲好

巴打,要攞3既話,mc要啱幾多?


Level 3既range其實比較大，MC盡量答岩60% (18題）啦

其實營商環境 + 管理導論 (Business environment + Management) 既MC題目多數都好直接，Accounting既部分都有少量題目係淺易啲唔洗計好深既數，岩18題唔難；預留d空間比自己Paper 2 失分

我喺呢個post share過條link入面係有by-topic 既 MC，可以做熟少少去考，你會發現必修雖然好多野背但非常明顯地有d題目係考評局比較中意既；例如：MPF咩人要供咩人唔洗供

考Paper 2A 會計選修 既我講多少少：

Partnership 大家都估一定會出。根據過去幾年既情況黎睇：
2012：Realization
2013 : Revaluation
2014 : Appropriation
2015 : Realization
2016: Revaluation
2017: 根據以上規律就出Appropriation

For 中文讀既同學：Realization = 變產; Revaluation = 重估； Appropriation = 分配帳 / 盈利分撥帳

Aim 4 or 以下既同學：有足夠時間既話唔好只溫Appropriation; 參考翻CE2008Q6，合夥人加入退出 (同重估嗰課較大關係, 2008Q6a), 分配帳 (2008Q6(c) 既capital入面有appropriation items)、Realization 變產 (2008Q6b) 係可以放同一條問題出！所以考評局今年玩野既話，可以整條Section C既題目一次過包曬合夥大部分課題！有時間既話最好都做一做Revaluation & Realization 相關既題目鞏固自己既知識。

Aim 5 / 以上既同學：AL出過 Incomplete Record (不完整會計記錄)+ Partnership financial statements. 可參考AL PA 2011.PAPER 1.Q1；呢題cut咁d items其實可以出DSE既Section C，整一題 Incomplete records + Partnership financial statements既題目。如果你想一次過溫曬 Incomplete record + partnership financial statements，不妨試試呢題。但留意(ix) Petty cash 係out-syl的。

其實答BAFS真係最緊要個人唔好亂，成日見d學生一見長題目（特別Incomplete record）就哂勁多時間去Structure個故事。

我做果任何數多數都跟隨三條原則：
1）乜野數都起碼用兩次
2）見到乜都寫喺係份卷度當Working話比Marker知你知呢粒數要用/點用
3）睇過嘅Point如非必要從不返睇 （好撚重要）

有D 1999，希望閱位考得好

How to distinguish between realisation concept and accrual concept?


good question, 冇人答既話我今晚答 溫緊考試

Realisation: revenue can be recognised only when major earning process has completed and the value has been objectively determined
要perform左你既服務先可以recognise，唔係收cheque 個刻

Accrual: revenue and expenses should be accounted at the time they incur, but not time time they are received/paid.
姐係今年應收/比既revenue/expenses要mark落今年既數，即使你未收到/比

How to distinguish between realisation concept and accrual concept?


Accrual concept - 理念係一切入賑所講既都係accrual basis而唔係cash basis (即係你＂incur＂左果個Revenue或者Expenses既時侯就應該book條數而唔係講你幾時收錢)

Realisation Concept - 又可以叫做revenue recognition concept，有少少應用到accrual concept既理念。係Revenue recognition既題目，最重要係講到點為知＂＂incur＂左你呢個sales and costs—重點字眼就係Risks and rewards of the goods / Stage of completion of the services（好多人都漏左Service果part）。懶係professional搏好感可以寫埋而家新accounting standard講既Satisfaction of performance obligation 　（未必有分）

其實考試黎講最主要都係睇係個case係咪focus on Revenue既記錄，如果係既話多數都係答Realization concept，反之就會係Accrual concept。

出左黎做野之後好少見番呢Ｄ Concept既定義，希望幫到你清。

How to distinguish between realisation concept and accrual concept?


Accrual concept - 理念係一切入賑所講既都係accrual basis而唔係cash basis (即係你＂incur＂左果個Revenue或者Expenses既時侯就應該book條數而唔係講你幾時收錢)

Realisation Concept - 又可以叫做revenue recognition concept，有少少應用到accrual concept既理念。係Revenue recognition既題目，最重要係講到點為知＂＂incur＂左你呢個sales and costs—重點字眼就係Risks and rewards of the goods / Stage of completion of the services（好多人都漏左Service果part）。懶係professional搏好感可以寫埋而家新accounting standard講既Satisfaction of performance obligation 　（未必有分）

其實考試黎講最主要都係睇係個case係咪focus on Revenue既記錄，如果係既話多數都係答Realization concept，反之就會係Accrual concept。

出左黎做野之後好少見番呢Ｄ Concept既定義，希望幫到你清。

How to distinguish between realisation concept and accrual concept?


有人答過，我講少少。
Accrual concept:
Under the accrual concept, revenues and expenses are accrued, i.e. revenues and expenses are recognized and included in the financial statements when they are earned or incurred, not when they are received or paid in cash.

問題：咩叫When they are earned? 乜野時候，邊一刻先係 'earned'?

Realization principle 就係答緊呢個問題：
Realization principle / revenue recognition:
The princple governs that revenue shuold be recognised only when the related service has been provided (or when goods are delivered) to customers, and not when the monies are received.

Alternative answer:
Realization principle requires that the revenue be recognized and recorded when goods are sold or when services are rendered.


考試角度點樣分呢？
如果題目提及：Prepay expenses / accrued expenses 一定係Accrual, 因為同revenue 無關既野唔會用Realization principle.

如果題目提及"Unearned revenue" (e.g. 收倒訂單當日，未送貨出去就記錄Sales) ，咁你可以講Realization principle. 其實Accrual concept 都係岩既，但係Realization principle 既相關性會更大。

如果題目提及"Accrued revenue"，例如：For the year ended December 31, 你已經提供左12個月既清潔服務，但12月既清潔服務費個客下年1月先比錢，而公司冇喺year ended Dec 31 記錄12月既清潔費收入(revenue)，咁就係violate Accrual. 呢個情況黎講，realization principle 既相關性就細d，因為題目既焦點係公司跟左Cash basis (現金收付) 去記錄收益，而非在收益賺得時記錄 (not recorded when revenue is earned)

試題參考：CE 2007 Q1(B)(b)，特別留意marking入面用左乜例子去講accrual / realization

考2b其實係咪好難攞**, 有無2b勁ge巴打教下點執分 小弟中文


Paper 1 盡量要拎到90%既分數，mc 小心新 topics 既野（gem果啲）
Paper 2 其實都係用主題句+說明+例子+收結 做每個 point 既結構 不過長短就按分數而定

近年考核方式都漸趨簡單為主，建議一定要背熟最重要果幾課 （e.g. Marketing 就係marketing segmentation, 4P, product life cycle, CRM果幾課)
操夠20年 AL past paper (要 sort 岩in syl既內容)+ dse 咁多年paper 應該都可以摸到啲答題方向， 一定要睇熟 marking scheme

而每一 part 既主題句一定要出到重點。short questions 唔使話驚太短而被扣分，1+1/2句已經好夠。 case study 就好睇elaboration 有冇套番落 case, 唔好比同case 太過 irrelevant 既資訊，寫多無謂。

利申12 5** 不過 syllabus 同考試 format 已經轉左好多，我估參考價值應該不大

首先Costing第一課嗰啲Terms 你要清楚係咩黎先，Direct cost indirect cost, variable vs. fixed cost 呢啲如果分唔清楚既話之後幾課係攬炒既，因為呢堆概念係成個Cost accounting 既基礎黎；

如果你明嗰啲基本既terms，其實啲Formula會易明好多

但坦白講要自修Cost accounting 有啲難度，時間所限最少溫熟financial accounting既野先；
根據2012-16經驗，
Depreciation / disposal 每年一條題目 / 一個深少少既item放入correction of error 或者 financial statements
2012 - 15: Bank Reconciliation 相關既最少都有一題，2016冇獨立出題目但放左Section C 既additional information
Partnership: 早幾頁都講過，一年Appro 一年Revel 一年Realization，輪迴到今年就出appropriation；
Correction of error: 打死都要溫，呢課你岩得多既話concept差極有限
Incomplete record: 原理簡單但題目複雜，你溫熟其它financial accounting 課題先掂佢；Practice paper, 2013, 2014, 2016都有；相比起會考黎講出現得頻密左；
Limited companies: 過去幾年都係同Corr of error 夾埋一齊玩；搞唔掂correction你操到呢課好熟背曬格式都作用唔大；

下面試下解多少少，如果你明呢度既野，90% Dissolution 既出法 / 變化都可以處理倒。

PDF 版本：https://www.dropbox.com/s/0mmvcza900mb10l/F511_Partnership%20dissolution%20principles.pdf?dl=0


合夥解散既幾個原則：
1. 清曬所有Accounts，原則上唔會開新Accounts出黎；所以所有解散過程中發生既Revenue / Expenses items入落去Realisation account，
例子一：Partnership 償還Trade Payables 所得既Discounts received
例子二：Dissolution expense (Dr. Realisation: Dissolution expense)

一項item唔肯定應該入Bank / Capital / Realisation, 點樣決定？
原則：
2. Partnership (公司)收錢 / 比錢既野就入Dr. / Cr. bank account，否則唔洗郁bank Account
3. 問下自己：Partnership 會唔會比翻錢個Partner?

Cr. Capital 既錢代表合夥會比翻Partners. 諗一個Sole proprietorship 例子：
Dr. Cash 1,000
Cr. Capital 1,000
假設冇任何profit / loss / drawings 等等發生過，Owner可以喺公司拎翻走$1,000既資源。

所以：XXX on behalf of partnership = Partner可以問公司拎翻錢→入Capital
E.g. Partner A paid dissolution expense on behalf of the partnership.
Dr. Realisation – dissolution expense (原則1)
Cr. Capital – A (原則3)
4. 綜合原則1, 2, 3: 如果：
Partnership 唔會比翻錢比partner → 唔會入Capital
Partnership 個 Bank account 冇收$比$ → 唔會入Bank
解散過程唔開新既Account → 如果冇account用會入Realisation

試試下面既野點做：
Q1:
2002Q7(iv)
Mak took over the motor vehicles at only $10,000, but he was also personally responsible for paying off 60% of the creditors. [Note: Creditors balance = 72,000]
Dr. Creditors ($72,000 x 60%) $43,200
Cr. ???
(答案睇Marking)

 
Q2 - Illustration
1992Q8(v)
Creditor balance: $253,500
Carmen settled all the trade creditor accounts at $250,000 out of her own savings. It was agreed that interest was to be charged at 1% of the amount loaned.
Dr. Trade creditor $253,500
Cr. ???
分析：
1. Partnership 既 Bank account 冇郁過→唔會Dr / Cr Bank.
2. 咁入Capital or realisation?
諗下Sole proprietorship 既 Case:
Owner settled all the trade creditor accounts at $250,000 out of her own savings.
Dr. Trade creditor $250,000
Cr. Capital $250,000

3. Out of owner’s own savings =/= Partnership 唔洗比翻錢比owners → 入Capital
Dr. Trade creditor $253,500
Cr. Capital – Carmen $?

4. Discount 屬於partnership 定係屬於Carmen? 都係諗翻Sole proprietorship:
Creditor balance = $253,500
Owner settled all the trade creditor accounts at $250,000 out of her own savings.
Owner 注入資本 (introduce capital) 既金額 = $250,000, hence
Dr Creditors $253,000
Cr. Capital $250,000
Balance→ Cr. Discounts received $3,500

翻黎呢條題目，我地而家有既Entry 係:
Dr Creditors $253,000
Cr. Capital - Carmen $250,000
Cr. Dissolution: Discounts received $3,500

5. 最後仲有一樣野要處理 – interest:
Carmen settled all the trade creditor accounts at $250,000 out of her own savings. It was agreed that interest was to be charged at 1% of the amount loaned.

1% of the amount loaned = $250,000 x 1% = $2,500

同埋巴打可唔可以教埋我CE2010 q5 motor vehicles個depreciation係點計


Trial Balance (1 Jan):
Cost = 1,300,000
A/D = 420,000

Sold motor vehicle:
Purchase on 1 Jan 2008, Cost = $120,000
A/D up to 1 Jan 2009 = $120,000 x 20% = 24,000
Depreciation for the year ended 31 Dec 2009
= ($120,000 - $24,000) x 20% x 11/12 = 17,600
A/D up to date of disposal = 30 Nov = $24,000 + $17,600 = $41,600

Depreciation Expense for Motor vehicles:
Not sold in the year ended 31 Dec 2009,
Cost = $1,300,000 - $120,000 = 1,180,000
A/D = $420,000 - $24,000 = 396,000
NBV = Cost – A/D = $1,180,000 - $396,000 = 784,000
Depreciation expense for unsold vehicle = NBV @ 20% = $784,000 X 20% = $156,800

Total depreciation expense for the year = $156,800 (unsold) + $17,600 (sold) = 174,400

比多個計法你參考：
Step 1: 唔理dispose嗰部車，用翻TB個數計全年depreciation
Cost = $1,300,000
A/D @ Jan 1 (all vehicles) = $420,000
NBV @ Jan 1 = $880,000
Dep = 20% of NBV = $176,000

$176,000 計多左咩？就係計多左部Disposal 既車。
架車 Nov 30 賣走，姐係話有1個月冇用到部車；呢部車有1個月既Depreciation 係唔應該計，但包括左喺$176,000入面；

搵翻Dispoed vehicle 一個月既Depreciation expense:
Disposed vehicle
Cost: $120,000
A/D @ Jan 1: $24,000 (=$120,000 x 20%)
NBV @ Jan 1: $96,000
1個月Depreciation expense = $96,000 x 20% x 1/12 = $1,600

所以Depreciation expense on income statement = $176,000 - $1,600 = $174,400

Planning organising 點分？


睇睇佢兩個Definition 先

Planning = Set goals / objectives 相關既野；例如三年內開XX間分店，開發新產品，進軍邊度既市場等等；

Organising 組織：點樣安排啲資源去完成你planning stage 設定左既目標；
主要講：
(1) Organisational structure, 姐係有幾多層。凈系要高層中層低層，中間再加幾層 or 簡單啲老細+員工兩層就算？
(2) Departmentalisation: 點樣分唔同部門？ By function / product / geographical?

問下大家點搵以下既野:

1. Given
Time A: produce 100 unit with $20000 total manu. Overhead
Time B: produce 150 units with $32000 total manu. Overhead
=> find fixed MO and variable MO per unit

2. Given
Time A:
sell 1000 product A and 3000 product B
CM(A): $5/unit
CM(B): $8/unit
Profit: $80000

=>want to maintain same sales mix next year, find the breakeven amount in unit for EACH product (CM unchanged)

問下大家點搵以下既野:

1. Given
Time A: produce 100 unit with $20000 total manu. Overhead
Time B: produce 150 units with $32000 total manu. Overhead
=> find fixed MO and variable MO per unit

2. Given
Time A:
sell 1000 product A and 3000 product B
CM(A): $5/unit
CM(B): $8/unit
Profit: $8000

=>want to maintain same sales mix next year, find the breakeven amount in unit for EACH product (CM unchanged)

問下大家點搵以下既野:

1. Given
Time A: produce 100 unit with $20000 total manu. Overhead
Time B: produce 150 units with $32000 total manu. Overhead
=> find fixed MO and variable MO per unit

high-low method

(32000-20000)/(150-100)
=variable manufacturing overhead per unit

之後用total manufacturing overhead 減variable個數搵fixed

問下大家點搵以下既野:

1. Given
Time A: produce 100 unit with $20000 total manu. Overhead
Time B: produce 150 units with $32000 total manu. Overhead
=> find fixed MO and variable MO per unit

high-low method

(32000-20000)/(150-100)
=variable manufacturing overhead per unit

之後用total manufacturing overhead 減variable個數搵fixed

對的

另一方法可以用math core既聯立方程

Let VMO=x, FMO=Y

Set:
100x+y=20000
150x+y=32000

其實concept 一樣，做既野既concept都一樣，睇下大家鍾意點

Appropriation items 入current 既原則：
未比既部分就入Current.

例如Salaries to partners, 假設全年entitle to $12,000；有8個月比左；

Sep 1, 20X1
Dr. Salaries to partners: Mr. A $8,000
Cr. Current - A $8,000

去到Dec 31 year end. 有4個月未比
Dr. Salaries to partners: Mr. A $4,000
Cr. Current - A $4,000

Closing entries:
Dr. P/L appropriation $12,000
Cr. Salaries to partners: Mr. A $12,000

通常題目都係比：The following balances was extracted from the books of the partnership as at 31 December 20X1:

呢個Current account balance @ 31 December 20X1 已經include左 Sep 1 記錄既$8,000
所以Dec 31 開current account只會入$4,000 落Current account

但係P/L appropriation 個Salaries = $12,000 = 全年應該享有既salaries

你問嗰題既Interest on capital 道理一樣

1. 其實睇題目情況而定；
如果你賣部舊iPhone比收買佬賣倒 $1,500 (disposal value)，拎去Apple Store trade-in 新 iPhone 佢就當你部iPhone價值$1,000 (trade-in value)，你會點處理部iPhone?

你諗下：如果舊Asset 既disposal value 係$15,000，拎去Trade-in 就價值 $10,000，你會Trade-in定係直接賣走舊Asset?

2. 接收Special order 會唔會影響你本身已有既order？ 如果唔影響，姐係舊有order既Revenue / cost 唔會因為呢個special order而改變；所以舊有order喺呢個決策上係不相關；不相關既野喺計算上面就無需要考慮。

"因為costing只test on incremental cost": 不完全正確，costing有好多做法；例如：加價會賣少左件數，應唔應該加價？你有最少兩個分析方法：
1. 整2份 Income statement 比較加價前後既Net income 去決定加唔加價
2. 只考慮加價會令Contribution margin 點樣改變、數量會點樣改變，由此計Total contribution margin 升跌去答應否加價

3.
Drawings account 會Close 入Capital → nominal account
Capital account: 有Balance c/f，會帶去Statement of financial position → Real account

之前答你唔倒係因為分唔倒你問以下邊樣。

你分清楚你想問咩 Case:

case 1: originally, goodwill account is opened. Goodwill was valued at $10,000
[old value]

after 1 Year, goodwill is revalued to $20,000 [revalued amount]. The partnership decided no goodwill account is to be maintained.

Case 2:
originally, no goodwill account is opened.
On 1 Jan 20X2, Mr. C retires from the partnership.
Goodwill is valued at $20,000 [revalued amount].

留意 case 2 係冇 old value.

我覺得你想問 Case 1, 但 case 1 出現既前提係以前有 keep 住 goodwill account, 所以先有所謂既 old value.

如果一直都唔 keep goodwill account, 每次做完 valuation 個 goodwill account 都會清左佢 (姐係冇 balance c/f), 根本不存在所謂 old value 同 revalued amount.

1) 如果同時有disposal value of old asset 同trade in value of old asset
咁係new asset一欄係先入trade value value
如果冇trade in value先入disposable value

如果冇trade in先dispose個asset
咁諗對嗎？

2）如果有special order
一定要入increase/decrease 既cost
唔可以連非special order既單去update total cost
因為costing只test on incremental cost
咁諗對？

3）why capital ac and drawings are nominal account? Won't they be transferred to next year like asset and liabilities?

Thanks


1. 其實睇題目情況而定；
如果你賣部舊iPhone比收買佬賣倒 $1,500 (disposal value)，拎去Apple Store trade-in 新 iPhone 佢就當你部iPhone價值$1,000 (trade-in value)，你會點處理部iPhone?

你諗下：如果舊Asset 既disposal value 係$15,000，拎去Trade-in 就價值 $10,000，你會Trade-in定係直接賣走舊Asset?

2. 接收Special order 會唔會影響你本身已有既order？ 如果唔影響，姐係舊有order既Revenue / cost 唔會因為呢個special order而改變；所以舊有order喺呢個決策上係不相關；不相關既野喺計算上面就無需要考慮。

"因為costing只test on incremental cost": 不完全正確，costing有好多做法；例如：加價會賣少左件數，應唔應該加價？你有最少兩個分析方法：
1. 整2份 Income statement 比較加價前後既Net income 去決定加唔加價
2. 只考慮加價會令Contribution margin 點樣改變、數量會點樣改變，由此計Total contribution margin 升跌去答應否加價

3.
Drawings account 會Close 入Capital → nominal account
Capital account: 有Balance c/f，會帶去Statement of financial position → Real account

Weighted Average Cost Method係咩黎嫁
成個syllabus就係差佢

同問 costing入面closing inventory成日要用weighted average


Weighted average cost = 買左入黎既貨比左幾多 $ / 買左幾多件

1 Jan : purchased 10 units @ $10 each.
6 Jan: purchased 20 units @ 14 each.

on 1 Jan: weighted avg cost = $10 x 10 /10 = $10 per unit
on 6 Jan: weighted avg cost= ($100 + $280) / 30 units = $12.67 per unit

16 Jan: Sold 15 units
21 Jan : purchased 30 units @ 11 each

on 21 Jan, avg cost =
($10 x 10 + $14 x 20 + $11 x 30) / (10 + 20 + 30)
= $710/60
= $11.83

closing inventory as at 31 Jan
件數 = 10+20-15+30 = 45
per unit cost = $11.83

Cost of closing inventory = 45 x $11.83 = $532.35

Mixed cose入面 點計返fixed cost同variable cost係幾多？


假設：
做1000件，Total Cost = $90,000
做5000件，Total Cost = $160,000

設$V = Variable cost per unit, $F = Fixed cost
V x 1,000 + F = $90,000
V x 5,000 + F = $360,000

Solving the above,
F = $22,500
V = $67.5

1. 不開新Account，要close所有野
2. 合夥(公司)比$ 就入 Bank
3. Partners 代公司比 / take over XXX 就入Capital

因為2，3都唔中，所以waive左個interest就入Realisation

我成個錯左 完全唔知係咁答

想問 1b
係risk man定fin man?

想問 1b
係risk man定fin man?


個人傾向答Risk man
跟翻佢個Organisational chart, Account & Finance 放埋一齊；Account 主要做bookkeeping / recording of transaction / reporting; Finance 就主要做funding (集資), management of funds / cashflows etc. ；

Risk man 係負責Assess + manage risk;
Assess risk 就係睇下公司唔同範圍有咩risks
Manage risk 就係諗用咩方法去應對可能出現既risk；讀2B既應該會知一個叫TARA既framework，姐係
T: Transfer 風險轉移
A: Avoid 風險迴避
R: Reduce 風險減少
A: Accept 風險承擔

買保險係常見既Risk transfer 風險轉移策略；咁真係要claim保險既時候risk man suppose係最清楚份保險包左啲咩, claim procedures 係咩既部門，所以應該佢跟埋。
